name: nfhl-template
description: load all nfhl layers into bigquery

parameters.name: gcs_url
parameters.label: gcs path to nfhl state geodatabase
parameters.helpText: gcs path to nfhl state geodatabase

parameters.name: safe_mode
parameters.label: safe mode
parameters.helpText: set to first load geoms as strings into staging table

parameters.name: truncate
parameters.label: truncate table
parameters.helpText: set to truncate table before inserting
